sentences.english: Some people with recurrent stones choose to take prescription diuretics to reduce the risk.
sentences.chinese: 有些得複發性腎結石的人選擇處方利尿劑來降低風險。

sentences.english: It is recommended to monitor plasma potassium levels when using benazepril in combination with a potassium sparing diuretic.
sentences.chinese: 建議監測血鉀水平時，結合使用了利尿劑鉀苯那普利。

sentences.english: Just like alcohol, caffeine is a diuretic.
sentences.chinese: 就像酒精一樣，咖啡因也是一種利尿劑。

sentences.english: These medications help the kidneys remove excess fluid from the body.
sentences.chinese: 利尿劑可幫助腎臟排出體內過多的水分。

sentences.english: Caffeine is a diuretic, meaning it causes a person to urinate (pee) more.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因是一種利尿劑，它會讓人小便增多。

sentences.english: Thiazide diuretics are an especially affordable and often effective option.
sentences.chinese: 噻嗪類利尿劑尤其物美價廉。

sentences.english: Alcohol acts as a diuretic, making you even more dehydrated.
sentences.chinese: 酒起着利尿劑的作用，會使你更加脫水。

sentences.english: Diuretics can cause depletion of the blood volume and so impair placental blood flow and fetal growth.
sentences.chinese: 利尿劑可能會引起貧血從而損害胎盤血流和胎兒發育。

sentences.english: Note that diuretics probably should not be used in pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 不過需要注意的是利尿劑可能並不適合孕婦。

sentences.english: It has also been used as a diuretic and to treat infertility.
sentences.chinese: 它也被用來作爲一種利尿劑和治療不孕症。

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
